action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X X ▢
X X X X X
▢ ▢ X X ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a diagonal line from the top right to the bottom left, and additional Xs filling the entire third row.

▢ X X X ▢

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a T-shape in the center and additional Xs in the bottom row, second to fourth columns. The rest of the cells are empty.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a diagonal line from the top right to the bottom left, and additional Xs filling the entire third row.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any empty cells in the third row of your grid?

QUESTION: Are there any empty cells in the third row of your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

QUESTION: How many Xs are there in the second row of your grid?

QUESTION: Is there an X in the very first cell of your grid?

Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of your grid?

ANSWER: No
QUESTION: Is there an X in the center cell of your grid? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your grid and the other grid described the same?  Write "DECISION: same grid" if you think they are the same grid or "DECISION: different grids" if you think they are different grids. Do not add anything else.
